author: HemantMahawar
body:
- [ ] Update PSVersion in $PSVersionTable output
- [ ] Support SemVer in #Requires
- [ ] Allows cmdlet parameters to consume SemVer instead of System.Version (argument transformation maybe?)

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: @lzybkr: @HemantMahawar is under the impression that we're only doing 1 and 3 for Aug17. Is this accurate?

title: Support SemVer
